dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Three donor-recipient pairs, all operating simultaneously to avoid any last-minute issues. The logistics alone are mind-boggling.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The procedure involves a three-way kidney exchange between three donor-recipient pairs who are incompatible with their own relative but compatible with someone from another pair.
